info.name: Linux for Health Blue Button Tutorial
info.description:
Sample workflow for Creating and Updating Patient Resources

- Search for an existing patient resource using either a GET or POST request.
- Create a patient resource using POST.
- Add an email address to the patient record using UPDATE.
- Add an emergency contact to the patient resource using PATCH (json patch not FHIR patch)
- Execute a search to view the current state of the patient resource.
- View resource history using either /_history for all versions or /_history/<version number> for a specific version

The delete endpoint was used to "cleanup" records as this sample was being built.
